column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Iyi nye mbra a ɔwɔ hɔ ma ɔkwatanyi wɔ n'ahotsewee da no mu: wɔmfa no mbra ɔsɔfo no:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfir edzi nkɔ nseraban no ekyir: na ɔsɔfo no nhwɛ
column5: sɛ kwata ntsetsewee no asa wɔ ɔkwatanyi no mu a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔsɔfo no nhyɛ ma wɔmfa nnoma enyikan a hɔn ho tsew ebien
column5: nye odwonhataw mma nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho no mbra:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no nhyɛ mma wonku nnoma no mu kor wɔ dɛtsesɛn bi mu wɔ mbasu do:"
"anoma nyikan no dze
column5: nye serdaa no
column7: na ɔmfa ne nyinara nye anoma nyikan no mbɔ anoma a wokum no wɔ mbasu do no no bɔgyaa mu:"

column2: "na ɔmfa mpetse nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho efi kwata ho no do mpɛn esuon
column3: na ɔnka dɛ no ho atsew
column4: na ongyaa anoma nyikan no ma ɔnkɔ haban mu."

column2: "Na nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho no
column5: na onguar nsu mu
column6: na no ho aatsew: na n'ekyir no ɔmbra nseraban no mu dze
column7: na ɔntsena no buw ekyir nda esuon."

column2: "Na ɔmbra dɛ da a otsia esuon no
column3: na onyi no nhwi nyinara wɔ n'etsifi nye n'abɔdwesa nye no ntɔn
column4: mekyerɛ no nhwi nyinara na onyi: na ɔnhor ne ntar
column5: na onguar no honam wɔ nsu mu

column2: "Na da a otsia awɔtwe no ɔmfa nguambaanyin ebien a wonndzii dzɛm
column3: nye nguambaaber kor a oedzi afrenhyia a onndzii dzɛm
column4: na edziban afɔr isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu ebiasa a wɔdze ngo aforɔw
column5: na ngo toa kor

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no a ɔtsew no ho no mfa ɔbanyin a wɔrebɛtsew no ho no
column5: wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n'abowano:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfa nguambaanyin no mu kor
column3: na ɔmfa no mbra dɛ asodzi ho afɔr
column5: na ɔntow no ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim:"

column2: "na onku eguambaanyin no wɔ beebi mbrɛ woku bɔn ho afɔr nye ɔhyew afɔr abowa no
column3: wɔ ahotseweebea no do hɔ: na dɛ mbrɛ bɔn ho afɔr no yɛ ɔsɔfo no dze no
column4: dɛmara na asodzi ho afɔr no so: ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfa asodzi ho afɔr bɔgyaa no bi
column3: na ɔsɔfo no mfa nkeka nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho no n'aso nyimfa ano
column5: nye ne nan nyimfa kokonyin ano:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfa ngo toa no
column3: na onhue bi ngu nankasa ne nsa bankum mu:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mfa ne nsatseaba nyimfa mbɔ ngo no a ɔwɔ ne nsa bankum mu no mu
column3: na ɔmfa ne nsatseaba mpetse ngo no bi mpɛn esuon wɔ EWURADZE enyim:"

column2: "na ngo no nkaa no a ɔwɔ ne nsamu no ɔsɔfo no mfa bi nkeka nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho no n'aso nyimfa ano
column4: nye ne nan nyimfa kokonyin ano
column5: wɔ asodzi ho afɔr bɔgyaa no do:"

column2: "na ngo nkaa no a ɔwɔ ɔsɔfo ne nsamu no ɔmfa ngu nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho no etsifi: na ɔsɔfo mpata mma no wɔ EWURADZE enyim."
"Na ɔsɔfo no mbɔ bɔn ho afɔr no
column3: na ɔmpata mma nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho wɔ n'ahoɔfi ntsi; na n'ekyir no onku hyew afɔr abowa no:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no mbɔ hyew afɔr no nye edziban afɔr no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do: na ɔsɔfo no mpata mma no
"Na sɛ odzi hia
column3: na onnkotum enya no dodow dɛm a
column4: ɔno ɔmfa eguambaanyin kor mbɛyɛ asodzi ho afɔr mma wɔntow mfa mpata mma no
column5: na edziban afɔr isiam pa efa ebupɛn du mu kor a wɔdze ngo aforɔw

column2: "na ntamram ebien
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ne nsa bɔso do ara; na kor nyɛ bɔn ho afɔr
column5: na kor so

column2: "Na da a otsia awɔtwe no ɔmfa mbrɛ ɔsɔfo no
column5: wɔ n'ahoguar ntsi."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mfa asodzi ho afɔr eguambaa no
column4: na ɔsɔfo no ntow no nyɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim:"

column2: "na onku asodzi ho afɔr eguambaa no
column3: na ɔsɔfo no mfa asodzi no afɔr bɔgyaa no bi
column4: na ɔmfa nkeka nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho no n'aso nyimfa ano
column5: nye ne nsa nyimfa kokrobetsir
column6: nye ne nan nyimfa kokonyin ano:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no nhue ngo no bi ngu nankasa ne nsa bankum mu:"
"na ɔsɔfo no mfa ne nsatseaba nyimfa mfa ngo no a ɔwɔ ne nsa bankum mu no bi mpetse mpɛn esuon wɔ EWURADZE enyim:"
"na ɔsɔfo no mfa ngo no a ɔwɔ ne nsamu no bi nkeka nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho no n'aso nyimfa ano
column4: nye ne nan nyimfa kokonyin ano wɔ mbrɛ asodzi ho afɔr bɔgyaa no wɔ no:"

column2: "na ngo no ne nkaa no a ɔwɔ ɔsɔfo no nsamu no ɔmfa ngu nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho no etsifi
column3: mfa nyɛ mpata mma no wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Na ɔmfa ntamram anaa mborɔnomamba no mu kor
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ne nsa bɔso do no ara mbra;"

column2: "mekyerɛ dɛ mbrɛ ne nsa bɔso do no ara
column4: na kor so nyɛ ɔhyew afɔr nka edziban afɔr no ho: na ɔsɔfo no mpata nyia wɔrebɛtsew no ho no wɔ EWURADZE enyim."

column2: "Iyi nye mbra a ɔwɔ hɔ ma nyia kwata ntsetsewee aka no a ne nsa nnso n'ahoguar adze do no."
"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses nye Aaron dɛ
column4: "Sɛ hom du Keenan asaase a medze rema hom dɛ enyadze no do
column5: na sɛ medze kwata ntsetsewee mobɔto hom enyadze asaase do fie bi mu a;"

column2: "ɔno fie no wura no mbra
column3: na ɔmbɛka nkyerɛ ɔsɔfo no dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ me dɛ biribi tse dɛ ntsetsewee bi esi fie no mu hɔ:"

column2: "na ɔsɔfo no nhyɛ ma wonyi fie no mu ndzɛmba nyinara
column3: ansaana ɔsɔfo no akɔ mu akɔhwɛ ntsetsewee no
column4: amma dza ɔwɔ fie no mu nyinara ho eenngu fi: na n'ekyir no ɔsɔfo no nkɔ mu nkɔhwɛ fie no:"

column2: "na ɔnhwɛ ntsetsewee no
column5: sɛ ntsetsewee no wɔ fie no ne fadum ho ntokurntokur mu nkekaa ebunebun anaa mberberee
column6: na n'enyi atotɔ mu asen ɔfadum no a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔsɔfo no mfi fie no mu mpue fie no n'abowano
column3: na ɔntow fie no mu nda esuon:"

column2: "na da a otsia esuon no ɔsɔfo no mbra bio
column5: sɛ ntsetsewee no atserɛw wɔ fie no ne fadum ho a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔsɔfo no nhyɛ ma wonyiyi abo a ntsetsewee no wɔ ho no
column3: na wɔnkɔtow ngu kurow no n'ekyir mbrɛ hɔ nntsew:"

column2: "na ɔmma wɔntwerɛw fie no mu nhyia
column3: na wɔmfa dɛtse a wɔatwerɛw no nkogu kurow no ekyir mbrɛ hɔ nntsew:"

column2: "na wɔmfa abo fofor na wɔmfa nhyehyɛ abo no n'ananmu; na ɔmfa dɛtse fofor
column3: na ɔmfa ntetar fie no ho."

column2: "Na oetutu abo no ekyir
column3: na ɔatwerɛw fie no mu ekyir
column5: na sɛ ntsetsewee no ba bio
column6: na opue wɔ fie no mu a;"

column2: "ɔno ɔsɔfo no mbra mbɔhwɛ
column4: sɛ ntsetsewee no atserɛw wɔ fie no mu a
column5: ɔyɛ kwata nwewee wɔ fie no mu: no ho nntsew."

column2: "Na ondwuruw fie no ngu famu
column5: nye fie no ne dɛtse nyinara; na ɔnsoa mfi kurow no mu mpue nkogu mbrɛ hɔ nntsew."

column2: "Afei so nyia ɔbɔkɔ fie no mu wɔ aber a wɔatow mu no nyinara mu no
column3: no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir."

column2: "Na nyia ɔda wɔ fie no mu no nhor ne ntar."
"Na sɛ wɔatetar fie no n'ekyir no
column5: na
column7: ntsetsewee no nntserɛw wɔ fie no mu a; ɔno ɔsɔfo no nka dɛ fie no ho tsew

column2: "Na ɔmfa nnoma ebien
column5: nye odwonhataw ntsew fie no ho:"

column2: "na onku nnoma no mu kor wɔ dɛtsesɛn mu wɔ mbasu do:"
"na ɔmfa kyindur dua no
column5: nye anoma nyikan no
column6: na ɔmfa anoma a woeku no no no bɔgyaa mu
column8: na ɔmfa mpetse fie no do mpɛn esuon:"

column2: "na ɔmfa anoma no no bɔgyaa
column5: nye kyindur dua no

column2: "mbom ongyaa anoma nyikan no ma omfi kurow no mu nkɔ haban hantann no mu: ma ɔmpata mma fie no: na no ho ntsew."
"Iyi nye mbra a ɔwɔ hɔ ma kwata ntsetsewee ahorow nyinara
"nye ntar nye fie ho kwata;"
"na soaa
"ma wɔdze akyerɛkyerɛ aber a adze ho nntsew
column3: nye aber a adze ho tsew: iyi nye kwata ho mbra."
